assessment.title: Match Features to Wants Game - Buick
assessment.introText:
With all the questions, play with these assumptions:

  • Vehicles are the most recent model year.
  • Unless otherwise stated, vehicles have automatic transmissions.
  • There are no dealer or factory incentives.
  • All the seats are up when considering trunk/cargo space.
  • The customers want the best option (most legroom, most headroom, highest horsepower, highest gas mileage, lowest base price).
  • There are no add-on packages included.

Try to get all 10 right! Once you’ve selected a vehicle, hit SUBMIT. Then review the feedback. Take all the time you need to look at the questions and answer options before clicking GO.

See how well you did. Then, come back again and do better. The questions and answers will change!

Click NEXT to begin.

question.questionBody: The customer wants a Buick for under $30,000 that has Connected Navigation. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer wants a vehicle with a base price of no more than $30,000 and offers a moonroof or sunroof. Which vehicle offers a moonroof or sunroof?
The customer is fond of the Buick Regal but wants remote start. Which Regal offers remote start?
The customer wants a Buick that gets at least 25 mpg and that offers a heated steering wheel. Which Buick offers a heated steering wheel?
The customer needs a vehicle that has at least 35 inches of rear-seat legroom and that offers Connected Navigation. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer loves the luxurious look of the LaCrosse but wants a heated steering wheel. Which LaCrosse has a heated steering wheel?
The customer loves the Buick Encore for its great gas mileage but wants heated seats. Which Encore offers heated seats?
The customer wants a Buick that offers a moonroof or sunroof that gets the best gas mileage. Which Buick gets the best gas mileage?
The customer wants a Buick that offers remote start. Which Buick offers remote start?
The customer needs a vehicle that has a moon roof or sunroof and gets at least 25 mpg combined. Which vehicle gets the best mpg?
The customer wants a vehicle that has a heated steering wheel and at least 35 inches of headroom. Which has the most interior headroom?
The customer wants remote start on his vehicle and at least 250 horsepower. Which vehicle has the highest horsepower?
The customer wants a vehicle with at least 35 inches of rear-seat legroom and has heated seats. Which vehicle has heated seats?
The customer needs a vehicle with Connected Navigation and at least 35 inches of headroom. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer wants a vehicle that has a moon roof or sunroof, and heated seats. Which vehicle offers heated seats?
The customer wants a vehicle with heated seats and at least 30 cubic feet of cargo space. Which vehicle has the most cargo space?
The customer wants a vehicle with remote start and at least 30 cubic feet of cargo space. Which vehicle has remote start?

assessment.title: Match Features to Wants Game - GMC
assessment.introText:
With all the questions, play with these assumptions:

  • Vehicles are the most recent model year.
  • Unless otherwise stated, vehicles have automatic transmissions.
  • There are no dealer or factory incentives.
  • All the seats are up when considering trunk/cargo space.
  • The customers want the best option (most legroom, most headroom, highest horsepower, highest gas mileage, lowest base price).
  • There are no add-on packages included.

Try to get all 10 right! Once you’ve selected a vehicle, hit SUBMIT. Then review the feedback. Take all the time you need to look at the questions and answer options before clicking GO.

See how well you did. Then, come back again and do better. The questions and answers will change!

Click NEXT to begin.

question.questionBody: The customer wants a GMC that offers at least 29 inches of cargo space but also offers heated seats. Which GMC offers heated seats?
The customer wants a GMC with at least 41 inches of headroom but also offers a moonroof or sunroof. Which GMC offers a moonroof or sunroof?
The customer loves a Sierra with a lot of horsepower. Which Sierra offers the most horsepower?
The customer wants a GMC Canyon that offers Connected Navigation. Which Canyon offers Connected Navigation?
The customer wants a GMC with the lowest base price and offers a moonroof or sunroof. Which GMC has the lowest base price?
The customer wants a GMC that has a moonroof or sunroof and heated seats. Which vehicle offers a moonroof or sunroof?
The customer needs a GMC that offers third-row seating and gets good gas mileage. Which GMC gets the best mpg?
The customer wants a GMC with a V-6 or larger engine that offers remote start. Which vehicle offers remote start?
The customer needs a GMC that has a moon roof or sunroof, and gets at least 21 mpg combined. Which vehicle gets the best mpg?
The customer wants a vehicle that has a heated steering wheel and at least 40 inches of headroom. Which has the most interior headroom?
The customer wants remote start on his vehicle and at least 250 horsepower. Which vehicle has the highest horsepower?
The customer wants a vehicle with at least 35 inches of rear-seat legroom and that has heated seats. Which vehicle has heated seats?
The customer needs a vehicle that has at least 250 horsepower and has available third-row seating. Which vehicle has third-row seating?
The customer needs a vehicle with Connected Navigation that has at least 35 inches of headroom. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer needs third-row seating and at least 30 inches of rear-seat legroom. Which vehicle offers third-row seating?
The customer needs a vehicle that gets at least 25 mpg and offers Connected Navigation. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer wants a vehicle with heated seats and at least 30 cubic feet of cargo space. Which vehicle has the most cargo space?
The customer wants a vehicle with remote start and that has at least 30 cubic feet of cargo space. Which vehicle has remote start?

assessment.title: Match Features to Wants Game - Chevrolet
assessment.introText:
With all the questions, play with these assumptions:

  • Vehicles are the most recent model year.
  • Unless otherwise stated, vehicles have automatic transmissions.
  • There are no dealer or factory incentives.
  • All the seats are up when considering trunk/cargo space.
  • The customers want the best option (most legroom, most headroom, highest horsepower, highest gas mileage, lowest base price).
  • There are no add-on packages included.

Try to get all 10 right! Once you’ve selected a vehicle, hit SUBMIT. Then review the feedback. Take all the time you need to look at the questions and answer options before clicking GO.

See how well you did. Then, come back again and do better. The questions and answers will change!

Click NEXT to begin.

question.questionBody: The customer wants a vehicle that has two doors and has at least 250 horsepower. Which vehicle has the highest horsepower?
The customer wants a four-door vehicle that has a base price of no higher than $25,000. Which vehicle has the lowest base price?
The customer wants a vehicle under $30,000 that has remote start. Which vehicle offers remote start?
The customer wants a vehicle with a base price of no more than $30,000 and offers a moonroof or sunroof. Which vehicle offers a moonroof or sunroof?
The customer loves Camaros with a lot of horsepower. Which Camaro offers the most horsepower?
The customer likes the Chevrolet Equinox but needs it to get good gas mileage. Which Equinox gets the best gas mileage (mpg)?
The customer likes the look of the Chevrolet Cruze but also wants Connected Navigation. Which Cruze offers Connected Navigation?
The customer needs third-row seating and at least 30 inches of rear-seat legroom. Which vehicle offers third-row seating?
The customer needs a vehicle that gets at least 25 mpg and offers Connected Navigation. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer wants a vehicle with heated seats and at least 30 cubic feet of cargo space. Which vehicle has the most cargo space?
The customer wants a vehicle with remote start and that has at least 30 cubic feet of cargo space. Which vehicle has remote start?
The customer wants a vehicle with at least 220 horsepower that offers heated seats. Which vehicle offers heated seats?
The customer needs a vehicle that has a moon roof or sunroof and gets at least 25 mpg combined. Which vehicle gets the best mpg?
The customer wants a vehicle that has a heated steering wheel and at least 35 inches of headroom. Which has the most interior headroom?
The customer wants remote start on his vehicle and at least 250 horsepower. Which vehicle has the highest horsepower?
The customer wants a vehicle with at least 35 inches of rear-seat legroom and that has heated seats. Which vehicle has heated seats?
The customer needs a vehicle that has at least 250 horsepower and has available third-row seating. Which vehicle has third-row seating?
The customer needs a vehicle with Connected Navigation that has at least 35 inches of headroom. Which vehicle offers Connected Navigation?
The customer wants a vehicle with a V-6 engine that offers remote start. Which vehicle offers remote start?
The customer wants a vehicle that has a moonroof or sunroof and heated seats. Which vehicle offers a heated seats?
